extendedIngredients.name: avocado
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 medium ripe avocado, peeled and sliced

extendedIngredients.name: whole wheat tortillas
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 whole wheat tortillas (8 inches), room temperature

recipes.title: Zippy BLT Wraps
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Spread mayonnaise and salsa down the center of each tortilla. Sprinkle with the garlic powder, salt and pepper. Layer with bacon strips, lettuce, tomato and avocado; roll up tightly.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Zippy BLT Wraps in  Simple & DeliciousJuly/August 2009, p31                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 wrap equals 366 calories, 23 g fat (4 g saturated fat), 25 mg cholesterol, 692 mg sodium, 27 g carbohydrate, 4 g fiber, 12 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Spread mayonnaise and salsa down the center of each tortilla. Sprinkle with the garlic powder, salt and pepper. Layer with bacon strips, lettuce, tomato and avocado; roll up tightly.
